This Implementation Guide contains the full set of specifications for general case reporting workflows. It has been broken up into the following sections:
Key Concepts
Personas
Workflows
Use Cases
Use Case: Public Health Response case reporting as part of the public health response.

This Implementation Guide is intended to be supplemented by one or more content profiles developed for specific health program areas which will define the details of the case report. Examples of such content guides include:
HIV
Covid-19
This implementation guide is accomponied with an Instant OpenHIE technical specification.
